name: gtm-agents (gtmagents)

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Production-ready collection of GTM agents and specialized skills for claude code. Covers sales, marketing, customer success, and revenue operations workflows.

来源: https://github.com/gtmagents/gtm-agents
语言: Python
Stars: 84

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
**Popular Use Cases:**

*For Sales Teams:*
- [Generate 100 Leads in 5 Minutes](docs/use-cases/lead-generation-workflow.md) - Save 18 hours
- [Weekly Pipeline Health Check](docs/use-cases/pipeline-health-check.md) - Save 3 hours/week
- [Build a Cold Email Sequence](docs/use-cases/cold-email-sequence.md) - Save 2 hours per sequence

*For Marketing Teams:*
- [Create a Month of Content in 30 Minutes](docs/use-cases/content-calendar-30-days.md) - Save 25 hours/month
- [Plan 30 Days of Social Media](docs/use-cases/social-media-calendar.md) - Save 10 hours/month

*For Growth Teams:*
- [Segment Your C

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Business-First Architecture**: 67 plugins designed for non-technical users
- **Comprehensive GTM Coverage**: Sales, marketing, growth, customer success, and RevOps
- **100% Agent Coverage**: All plugins include specialized business agents
- **52 Business Skills**: Specialized knowledge with progressive disclosure
- **Clear Organization**: 24 categories tailored for business teams
- **Efficient Design**: Average 3.2 components per plugin (follows Anthropic's 2-8 pattern)
